steps.description: From the ShypBUDDY dashboard, click on the 'Manage NDR' tab.
In the Manage NDR section, view all failed delivery AWBs along with the respective failure reasons.
Select the appropriate action for each failed delivery: reattempt delivery, update address, provide alternate contact number, or initiate RTO (Return to Origin) instructions.

outcome: You can efficiently manage failed deliveries by taking timely actions to increase successful delivery rates.
note: Timely updates help reduce RTOs and improve delivery success.
